snippet.title: Ship Graveyard Simulator 2 - Steel Giants DLC Trailer
snippet.description:
The new Steel Giants DLC is coming and with it the beta version of the CO-OP Mode! 🔥 Check out what awaits you in the latest DLC! 👇
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2504670/Ship_Graveyard_Simulator_2__Steel_Giants_DLC/

The new MASSIVE challenge is waiting! Grab your hammer and get ready to dismantle the new colossi in Steel Giants DLC! 🚢 Wishlist Now to not miss the premiere! ⚓

---
#ShipGraveyardSimulator2 #steelgiants #shipgraveyard
